DOC.brief_summary: This non-interventional study is to analyse the therapeutic effectiveness in patients with severe COPD following a generally accepted 12-week treatment period with Symbicort Turbuhaler, which could anyhow be shortened or extended at physician's discretion.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Symbicort® Turbuhaler® (Budesonide/Formoterol) in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
DOC.criteria: non pregnant female COPD with persistent symptoms in spite of regular bronchodilator therapy Naive or fixed combination treated patients including patients already on Symbicort Turbuhaler Hypersensitivity to budesonide, formoterol or inhaled lactose
